A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As Kylo said \"Let the past die\" Most of the so called \"Experts\" are upset because practically everything old is put to rest. We've had nearly 40 years to enjoy the original trilogy. Its time for a new generation. New heroes\, new rebels\, new villains. For the first time ever\, we're FREE from Lucas' story-telling by rhyming. For the first time in 40 years\, no one but the director and writers will know whats going on. Im thankful for all the old adventures\, and EXTREMELY excited for all the new ones to come.
